subject: Suspicious login attempt detected
body:
We detected a login attempt from an unrecognized device in Moscow, Russia.

If this was you, you can ignore this message. Otherwise, please reset your password immediately.

Device: Windows PC
Location: Moscow, Russia

subject: Team standup tomorrow at 10am
body:
Hi team,

Just confirming our daily standup tomorrow at 10am in Conference Room B.

See you there!
Sarah
summary: Team standup meeting tomorrow at 10am in Conference Room B

subject: Quarterly review meeting - Dec 15
body:
Hello,

I'd like to schedule your quarterly review for December 15th at 2pm.

Please confirm your availability.

Best,
Manager

subject: Can you review the Q4 report?
body:
Hey,

Would you mind taking a look at the Q4 report when you get a chance? I need your feedback before Friday.

Thanks!

subject: Please update the documentation
body:
Hi,

Please update the API documentation with the new endpoints we discussed. Deadline is end of week.

Thanks,
PM
summary: Update API documentation by end of week
